1.name: Inverted Spear of Heaven
1.description: Nullifies any cursed technique upon impalement.

2.name: Chain of a Thousand Miles
2.description: Infinite-length chain capable of long-range attacks and grappling.

3.name: Black Rope
3.description: Disrupts cursed energy techniques upon contact.

4.name: Split Soul Katana
4.description: It is a katana that bypasses all resistance and cuts directly at the soul.

5.name: Dragon-Bone
5.description: A thick single-edged cursed blade with engine vents that stores and ejects kinetic and cursed energy, massively boosting its cutting power.

6.name: Kunai
6.description: Small dagger that can be imbued for throwing or stabbing.

7.name: Demon Slayer
7.description: Short sword of unknown full capability, effective against low-level curses.

8.name: Naginata
8.description: Polearm with curved blade for extended reach in melee combat.

9.name: Playful Cloud
9.description: Three-section staff that amplifies user’s physical strength.

10.name: .357 Magnum Revolver
10.description: Magnum revolver that fires hex-infused bullets with an extra charged round.

11.name: Marksman's Sniper Rifle
11.description: Long-range rifle that fires enhanced cursed bullets.

12.name: Katana
12.description: Blade becomes fully cursed after years of energy infusion.

13.name: Tonfas
13.description: Wooden tonfas that can be momentarily imbued for strikes.

14.name: Nails
14.description: Single-use nails powered for piercing and voodoo-like damage.

15.name: Arrows
15.description: High-pressure blood-infused arrows for powerful ranged attacks.

16.name: Grandma Ogami’s Spear
16.description: Spear used in seance rituals, lethal upon impalement.

17.name: Nanako’s Cell Phone
17.description: Controls targets via photographs taken by the phone.

18.name: Momo’s Broom
18.description: Flying broom that generates slashing wind attacks.

19.name: Festering Life Sword
19.description: A blade infused with life and death; its six barrels fire cursed insect eggs that hatch inside victims, causing swarms to burst out.

20.name: Hand-Shaped Sword
20.description: Self-moving sword that can strike or be thrown.

21.name: Sheathed Sword
21.description: Sword used with Ratio Technique for guaranteed critical hits.

22.name: Electric Guitar
22.description: Converts guitar sound into cursed energy shockwaves.

23.name: Juzo’s Axe
23.description: Large axe with unspecified cursed enhancements.

24.name: Mei’s Axe
24.description: Heavy battle axe wielded with supernatural strength.

25.name: Ogami’s Prayer Beads
25.description: Rosary used for necromantic summons and soul transfer.

26.name: Nobara’s Hammer
26.description: Hammer used to drive nails for doll technique.

27.name: Rubber Hammer
27.description: Toy hammer for low-level curses; disposable.

28.name: Mimiko’s Doll
28.description: Voodoo doll for remote cursing effects.

29.name: Straw Doll
29.description: Doll used for straw doll technique to harm target remotely.

30.name: Tantō
30.description: Short blade for high-speed lethal strikes.

31.name: Kamutoke
31.description: A powerful cursed tool which is capable of discharging electricity.

32.name: Hoten
32.description: A trishula-like trident cursed tool that Sukuna wielded a thousand years ago. Its capabilities are unknown.

33.name: Steel Arm
33.description: The cursed tool covers entire arm in a metal shell and further reinforces his punches.

34.name: Maki's glasses
34.description: They allow users who do not possess cursed energy to see curses.

35.name: Megumi's black sword
35.description: Megumi's primary cursed tool was a sword with a jet-black blade.

36.name: Megumi's double-edged sword
36.description: One-handed, lightweight weapon with a double-edged sword with a cylinder-shaped handle. Megumi currently carries in his shadow.

37.name: Prison Realm
37.description: Containing a barrier capable of sealing absolutely anything or anyone inside of an inescapable pocket dimension.

38.name: Inventory Curse
38.description: A cursed spirit that stores his entire arsenal within its body, enabling rapid weapon swaps.

39.name: Nyoi Staff
39.description: Conducts his cursed energy like a lightning rod, enabling precise polearm attacks in close combat.

40.name: Gavel
40.description: Hiromi’s gavel is a shape-shifting cursed tool that can turn into various weapons, becoming the Executioner’s Sword for Death Penalty.

41.name: Executioner’s Sword
41.description: A giant black blade that manifests during Death Penalty, capable of instantly executing cursed spirits or sorcerers once found guilty by Judgeman.

42.name: Sword of Extermination
42.description: A forearm-mounted blade imbued with positive energy, highly effective against curses and humans.
